svt_i2c_slave_addr_bit_stretching_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_slave_addr_bit_stretching_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This sequence configure Slave for stretching the clock after each bit of Address byte, by making SCL line LOW with User define clk_stretch_time_addr_byte, which shows time for which the SCL line goes LOW.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives the values of attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes default value.

  • Assigns received value of class attributes to its local attributes

  • Execute sequence to configure Slave for stretching the clock after each bit of address byte
